scripts.debug: npm run clean:release && npm run static && npm run js && npm run css
scripts.static: cp -r app/src/images/. app/release && cp app/src/index.html app/release/index.html
scripts.css:min: lessc --clean-css app/src/less/style.less app/release/style.min.css && place app/release/index.html style.css style.min.css
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babel --preset minify app/release/main.js > app/release/main.min.js && place app/release/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
